name: Log Analysis and Correlation
description: Investigating security incidents by analyzing system and network logs.

cards.title: Parsing System and Network Logs
cards.description: Using forensic techniques to analyze log files for security incidents.
cards.bulletpoints: Syslog analysis, SIEM tools, log parsing techniques

cards.title: Threat Correlation and Incident Response
cards.description: Connecting multiple log sources to identify and mitigate security threats.
cards.bulletpoints: Cross-log correlation, anomaly detection, attack pattern recognition
